description:
Experienced Legal Counsel For Your Injury Or Loss

At the Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC law firm in Poland, Ohio, our attorneys possess an astounding 400 years of combined experience among them. As a result of our efforts, we have secured well over $450 million in settlements and awards on behalf of personal injury victims and their families. In addition, we also assist injured and disabled workers obtain their rightful workers' compensation benefits.

Serving Poland And The Surrounding Areas

If you live in the Poland area or any part of Mahoning County or the surrounding areas, and suffered an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions, you can trust the attorneys at our law firm to fight hard on your behalf to help you secure the compensation and benefits you deserve.

Inside Knowledge Of Insurance

Having defended insurance companies against liability claims, we possess in-depth knowledge of the tactics insurance providers use to deny claims or reduce the amount they will pay. Armed with this knowledge, we can devise strategies to help make the companies honor their policies and pay you the money you deserve.

Receive Help From An Award-Winning Attorney

By providing personalized attention to our clients' cases and delivering the highest level of legal service possible to those in need, many of our attorneys have received awards and honors, and our law firm is widely regarded as one of the top personal injury practices in the region.

You do not have to suffer alone, and you need an attorney on your side dedicated to protecting your rights and interests and helping you secure the financial compensation you deserve.

To discuss your case in more detail, you can contact Kisling Nestico & Redick LLC to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
